In England, in the seven days to 06 April, there were 273,624 new confirmed cases (483.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 30 March, there were 446,956 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 39% (173,332 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 11 April is 18,217,512 (32,214.8 cases per 100,000 population).
